= Who are the developers behind imogene =

	_*imogene*_ has been developed by [http://www.medes.fr MEDES] for 3 years. It is only at the begin of 2011 that the project has been released with a LGPL license.


= What kind of server do I need to install the generated applications? =

	You need a Java server - Tomcat version 6 and (ideally) a PostgreSQL database


= Do I need a specific configuration on my server? =

	In many networks, the firewall is set up to allow only port 80.
	Tomcat default port is 8080. If you want your application to use the port 80, you will need to configure [http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_proxy.html Apache reverse proxy]
	
	{{{
	
	 # yourapp synchronisation
	 ProxyPass /PMTsync http://127.0.0.1:8180/YourAppSync 
	 ProxyPassReverse /YourAppSync http://127.0.0.1:8180/YourAppSync 
	 <Proxy http://127.0.0.1:8180/YourAppSync>
	        Order deny,allow
	        Allow from all
	 </Proxy>
	
	}}}


= How do I migrate my legacy database to this system =

	You can use an Open Source ETL like [http://www.talend.com/download.php Talend].
